root.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms VIII
root.description: GameplayThe eighth installment of the series contains a few new additions including the ability to play all eight main characters in the same game. You are also able to create up to 100 officers with unique skills. The PC version also included a "Power Up Kit" which was not present in the PS2 version. The Kit added improved AI, a player activity log, new scenarios, and the ability for generals to marry and have children.
